```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r }
gene_description <- read.delim("~/Documents/GitHub/CryptoGat201RNASeq_draft/input_annotation/H99.10p.aATGcorrected.2018-12-03.gff3",
header=FALSE, quote="")
```



```{r }
Gene_desc_new <- filter(gene_description, V3 == "mRNA")%>% 
                 separate(V9,into = c("ID", "Parent", "Name", "Codon_start", "Locua", "Product"),
                 sep=";",
                 remove = FALSE)
write.csv(Gene_desc_new, file = "~/Documents/GitHub/CryptoGat201RNASeq_draft/results_deseq/GeneDescription.csv")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
